data.title: Growth Lead
data.summary: Exponent is looking for a growth lead to assist us with our growth efforts and expand Exponent’s presence.
data.description: You will take over our communications and make Exponent accessible to the Solana ecosystem, establishing it as the #1 place for DeFi users to generate predictable yield or improve their yield strategies on Solana. You will plan and execute targeted marketing campaigns, keep users updated with announcements and product updates, create educational content, and engage with the community to onboard new users.
requirements: Deep understanding of DeFi concepts
Capable of creating in-depth DeFi content
Familiarity with Solana and its DeFi ecosystem
Resourceful and proactive mindset
responsibilities: Plan and execute targeted marketing campaigns
Keep existing users up to date with announcements and product updates
Create educational content to facilitate access to Exponent’s yield products and strategies
Engage with the community to educate them about yield strategies and help onboard new users
Establish new strategic relationships and manage existing ones
Create marketing partnerships with other protocols
Attend Solana conference events to represent Exponent

organization.summary: Infrastructure for powerful web3 products at scale.
organization.description: Syndicate is building the infrastructure to take web3 mainstream. Developers leverage Syndicate’s products to abstract web3’s complexity, allowing teams to spend less time managing complex web3 infrastructure and more time building an exceptional end-to-end experience for their customers.
organization.name: Exponent

data.title: IT Engineer
data.summary: Polychain Capital is looking for a IT Engineer to manage corporate IT systems and ensure seamless end-user experiences.
data.description: In this role, you will serve as the primary helpdesk technician, resolving day-to-day IT issues for a global team. You will troubleshoot and maintain Apple endpoints, provide operational support for corporate IT systems, and manage laptops and mobile devices. You will also support AV tech during webinars and collaborate with security teams to automate IT operations. Your contributions will help shape the long-term IT and security strategy.
requirements: 3-5 years of experience managing corporate IT systems
Strong hands-on experience with macOS and iOS administration
Deep understanding of user administration
Familiarity with MDM platforms
Working knowledge of AV systems
Experience with SaaS application management
Familiar with office networking
Experience with EDR endpoint security tools
Ability to work independently and multitask
responsibilities: Serve as the primary helpdesk technician
Troubleshoot and maintain Apple endpoints
Provide operational support for corporate IT systems
Provision, configure, and manage laptops and mobile devices
Provide AV tech support during webinars and remote meetings
Support logistics for hardware shipping and deployment
Collaborate with security and engineering teams
Write and maintain technical documentation
Participate in on-call rotation
Continuously improve vendor relationships

organization.summary: Polychain is an investment firm focused on blockchain assets.
organization.description: Polychain is an investment firm committed to exceptional returns for investors through actively managed portfolios of blockchain-based digital assets.
organization.name: Polychain

data.title: Executive Assistant to the Head of Ecosystem
data.summary: Aptos is looking for a Executive Assistant to support the Head of Ecosystem to enable leadership to operate at maximum efficiency.
data.description: In this role, you will proactively manage the Head of Ecosystem’s schedule, draft communications, coordinate projects, organize travel and events, engage stakeholders, streamline processes, and handle sensitive information with discretion.
requirements: 3+ years of experience supporting executives in startups, tech, VC, or web3
Exceptional organizational and time-management skills
Strong written and verbal communication abilities
Self-starter attitude with a high degree of ownership and accountability
Comfortable with ambiguity and rapid change in a high-growth environment
Familiarity with blockchain, crypto, and the web3 ecosystem
Proficient with tools like Google Workspace, Notion, Slack, Zoom, and project management platforms
responsibilities: Manage and prioritize the Head of Ecosystem’s schedule
Draft and organize communications, agendas, and follow-ups
Track deadlines and action items across ecosystem efforts
Organize travel, accommodations, and conference registrations
Serve as a liaison between the Head of Ecosystem and internal team members and external partners
Identify ways to streamline systems and processes
Handle sensitive information with integrity and professionalism
benefits: 100% insurance premium coverage for medical, dental, and vision for you and your dependents
Flexible vacation time, 11 holidays, and floating company days off
Fun and inclusive in-person and digital events

organization.summary: Developing products and applications on the Aptos blockchain to redefine the web3 user experience.
organization.description: Aptos Labs is committed to developing products and applications on the Aptos blockchain that redefine the web3 user experience. The team consists of accomplished technical experts focused on creating better network tooling and seamless usability to bring the benefits of decentralization to the masses.
organization.name: Aptos Labs

projects.summary: Occaecat ipsum magna aute pariatur occaecat adipisicing culpa adipisicing ex occaecat. Cupidatat excepteur officia aliqua eu fugiat non sit quis veniam pariatur dolore ad irure qui ea. Aliquip labore quis irure tempor ea magna dolore voluptate do proident voluptate ex.
projects.description: The Aptos blockchain is a new blockchain infrastructure designed to enable mass adoption in the web3 era by providing a trusted, scalable, cost-efficient, and continually improving platform for building widely-used applications. Developed over three years by over 350+ developers worldwide, Aptos offers new and novel innovations in consensus, smart contract design, system security, performance, and decentralization. It natively integrates the Move language for fast and secure transaction execution, enables flexible key management and hybrid custodial options, achieves high throughput and low latency through a pipelined and modular approach for transaction processing, supports atomicity with arbitrarily complex transactions, optimizes for frequent and instant upgrades, and experiments with future initiatives to scale beyond individual validator performance. The Aptos blockchain provides a fundamental building block to bring web3 to the masses.
projects.name: Aptos

data.title: Head of Ecosystem Relations
data.summary: Consensys is looking for a Head of Ecosystem Relations to lead and grow our most important institutional and strategic partnerships.
data.description: You will own the strategy and execution for Linea’s top-tier partner relationships, ensuring mutual value creation and long-term success. You’ll lead a growing team of partner success managers focused on key verticals and collaborate closely with business development, product, and marketing to deliver a best-in-class experience for institutional and strategic builders.
requirements: 8–12 years in strategic partnerships, enterprise account management, or ecosystem roles
Experience working with or selling to banks, financial institutions, or large enterprises
Track record of managing teams and scaling operations
Excellent executive presence and communication skills
Strong operational and commercial acumen
Familiarity with blockchain infrastructure, smart contracts, and L1/L2 ecosystems
responsibilities: Serve as the primary commercial contact for Linea’s most important institutional and strategic accounts
Lead a team responsible for relationship management, partner success, and account growth across strategic verticals
Develop account plans, support onboarding, and coordinate internally to deliver on complex partner needs
Represent institutional partners internally and surface strategic feedback
Collaborate with BD, product, and growth teams to drive adoption and active usage
Help define Linea’s approach to enterprise and large partner support
Contribute to strategic initiatives like institutional liquidity programs and co-marketing activations
Maintain strong understanding of evolving crypto market and regulatory implications

investors.name: Greater Bay Area Homeland Development Fund

organization.description: With MetaMask, Infura, and a leading suite of blockchain products, we make it easy to build applications on Ethereum and participate in DeFi, NFTs, DAOs, and the metaverse.
organization.name: ConsenSys Software Inc.

data.title: Payments Lead
data.summary: Fireblocks is looking for a Payments Lead to drive Payments Product Adoption from onboarding to ongoing success.
data.description: You will be responsible for driving payments success across the customer lifecycle, improving key success metrics, and serving as a trusted advisor to payments executives. You will conduct technical workshops and lead data-driven executive business reviews while leveraging your deep payments industry knowledge.
requirements: 8-10 years of experience in Payments or Payments Consulting
Background in top-tier payments companies or Big 4 consulting
Deep knowledge of payments infrastructure and workflows
Fluency in payments vernacular
Strong experience in technical enablement and stakeholder management
Proven ability to lead strategic business reviews
responsibilities: Drive post-sales payments success
Improve GDR, NDR, and NPS through proactive engagement
Serve as a trusted advisor to payments executives
Conduct technical workshops and training
Lead data-driven executive business reviews
Leverage deep payments industry knowledge
Work closely with Product, Engineering, Sales, and Marketing

organization.summary: Fireblocks provides a suite of applications for managing digital asset operations and a development platform for blockchain businesses.
organization.description: Fireblocks is an enterprise-grade platform delivering a secure infrastructure for moving, storing, and issuing digital assets. It enables exchanges, custodians, banks, trading desks, and hedge funds to securely scale digital asset operations through patent-pending SGX & MPC technology.
organization.name: Fireblocks

data.title: Venture Investments Analyst Associate
data.summary: GSR is looking for a Investment Analyst to dive deep into the evolving world of crypto and unearth the next big thing.
data.description: You will conduct in-depth research on market trends and emerging narratives, perform due diligence on potential investments, and analyze data from on-chain and off-chain sources. You will enhance the investment process by streamlining data aggregation and improving overall workflows.
requirements: Bachelor's or higher degree in finance, economics, computer science, engineering, or a related technical field
At least 2+ years of experience in crypto markets, DeFi, or blockchain ecosystems
Deep analytical skills with the ability to assess financial models
Exemplary communication skills
Preference for individuals with functional experience in Web3
Prior professional experience in Venture Capital
responsibilities: Conduct in-depth research on market trends and emerging narratives
Perform deep due diligence on potential investments
Contribute to the underwriting of technical aspects
Engage with early-stage networks and protocols
Analyze data from on-chain and off-chain sources
Enhance the investment process by streamlining data aggregation
benefits: Free lunches when in the office

organization.summary: GSR is a crypto trading firm and liquidity provider with a decade of experience in the crypto market.
organization.description: GSR specializes in providing deep liquidity and personalized service to cryptocurrency projects and institutions. With a history dating back to 2013, GSR has been an active liquidity provider and investor in the crypto ecosystem, offering services such as OTC Trading, Derivatives, and Market Making. GSR's expertise spans across serving token issuers, institutional investors, miners, and leading trading venues.
organization.name: GSR Markets

data.title: Developer Relations
data.summary: Privy is looking for a Developer Relations to bridge the gaps between our product and developer community.
data.description: You will create and maintain code samples, establish a regular cadence of developer-focused content, collaborate with internal teams to improve documentation, and engage with the developer community through events and other channels.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in a developer advocacy, technical evangelism, technical writing or similar role
Strong programming skills and a deep understanding of the technologies the company uses
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Passion for building and engaging with developer communities
Strong problem solving skills
Ability to build relationships and collaborate with others
responsibilities: Create and maintain code samples, starter repos, and recipes that help developers integrate our product effectively
Establish and create a regular cadence of developer-focused content
Collaborate with internal teams to organize our documentation and gather developer feedback
Engage with the developer community through industry events and hackathons

organization.summary: One simple library to add beautiful authentication flows and powerful embedded wallets to your app
organization.description: At Privy, we’re building the tools that empower developers to build secure, self-custodial web3 products with delightful UX. Our mission is to build a better internet.
organization.name: Privy

data.title: Developer Relations Lead
data.summary: Aleo is looking for a Developer Relations Lead to foster and grow a developer ecosystem.
data.description: You will develop and publish content to educate and inspire developers on using Aleo's products and services. You will manage critical interfaces with the developer community, including Core Developer Calls, Discord, and in-person events. You will research and develop novel applications of the Aleo technology and work closely with internal teams to align developer relations activities with business objectives and product roadmaps. You will contribute to and maintain high-quality technical documentation and user guides to assist developers in understanding and utilizing our technologies. You will build relationships with and advocate for developers within the Aleo ecosystem.
requirements: Strong background in engineering, with an emphasis on protocol engineering or full-stack blockchain development
Solid understanding of blockchain concepts and, ideally, zero-knowledge proofs and their applications
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Experience in creating technical content
Experience in engaging with and growing technical communities
responsibilities: Develop and publish content to educate and inspire developers on using Aleo's products and services
Be the face of the Foundation and manage critical interfaces with the developer community, including Core Developer Calls, Discord, and in-person events
Research and develop novel applications of the Aleo technology
Work closely with internal teams to align developer relations activities with business objectives and product roadmaps
Contribute to and maintain high-quality technical documentation and user guides to assist developers in understanding and utilizing our technologies
Build relationships with and advocate for developers within the Aleo ecosystem
benefits: Monthly budget for expenses (home office setup & supplies, transportation, fitness & personal well-being, continued learning, etc.)
Ability to attend major industry conferences and global events at the company’s expense

organization.summary: Aleo offers a platform for building private applications using zero-knowledge proofs on a layer 1 blockchain.
organization.description: Aleo is pioneering the development of a new platform that enables the creation of fully private applications leveraging zero-knowledge proofs to ensure data privacy and security. By integrating decentralization, scalability, and privacy, Aleo aims to provide a comprehensive solution for developers looking to build applications that protect user data and enhance security without compromising on performance. The platform includes a Rust-based domain-specific language, Leo, designed to simplify the expression of logic in zero-knowledge, and snarkOS, a permissionless and scalable network for ZK-powered smart contracts.
organization.name: Aleo

data.title: Protocol Engineer
data.summary: Exponent is looking for a Protocol Engineer to work on protocol updates and advance Exponent as a core financial infrastructure for Solana’s onchain economy.
data.description: In this role you will work with our engineering team and contribute to, maintain, and improve Exponent’s core programs such as our AMM. You will work closely with our smart contract and product teams to scope and implement new protocol features. When needed, you will integrate new Solana-based protocols into Exponent and write interfaces for them. You will enjoy this role if you are interested in tackling complex DeFi challenges and designing financial infrastructure that is critical to powering Solana's on-chain economic activities.
requirements: Highly proficient in Rust
Easily understand major DeFi primitives (AMM, borrow/lend, order book, perpetual margin trading)
A passion for decentralized finance
responsibilities: Contribute to, maintain, and improve Exponent’s core programs such as our AMM
Work closely with our smart contract and product teams to scope and implement new protocol features
Integrate new Solana-based protocols into Exponent and write interfaces for them

organization.description: Syndicate is building the infrastructure to take web3 mainstream. Developers leverage Syndicate’s products to abstract web3’s complexity, allowing teams to spend less time managing complex web3 infrastructure and more time building an exceptional end-to-end experience for their customers.

data.title: Business Development Associate
data.summary: Chaos Labs is looking for a Business Development Associate to manage inbound leads drive deal cycles and represent the company at Web3 events.
data.description: You will manage and qualify inbound leads progressing them through the pipeline to ensure a seamless customer journey from initial outreach to closed-won deals. You will spearhead outbound efforts to identify and engage key projects and stakeholders driving new business opportunities. You will support the Head of Strategy and partner with the VP of Business Operations to advance deals by preparing proposals contract templates and other materials while facilitating legal and commercial aspects to ensure alignment with company objectives. You will act as the primary point of contact for prospects and clients throughout the deal cycle ensuring consistent and professional communication. You will coordinate and schedule calls meetings and follow-ups to maintain deal momentum. You will track and document meeting notes action items and updates ensuring all stakeholders are aligned. You will serve as a business overlay to vertical leads and customer success facilitating renewal and upsell strategies by aligning customer needs with business objectives and maximizing value. You will work closely with internal teams to ensure seamless handoffs and ongoing communication with clients. You will build and nurture key customer relationships focusing on driving long-term value and satisfaction. You will clearly articulate and develop value propositions for projects in the pipeline to drive and qualify leads effectively. You will represent the company at key Web3 Fintech Blockchain and DeFi events to network with potential partners and customers and identify and pursue strategic opportunities by engaging with industry leaders and influencers.
requirements: Bachelor’s degree in Business Marketing Finance or a related field.
3-4 years of experience in traditional sales or account management roles preferably in a B2B SaaS company with knowledge in Web3 DeFi and Blockchain.
Demonstrated ability to manage a sales pipeline build client relationships and close deals effectively.
Experience with CRM tools pipeline management and sales methodologies.
responsibilities: Manage and qualify inbound leads progressing them through the pipeline to ensure a seamless customer journey from initial outreach to closed-won deals.
Spearhead outbound efforts to identify and engage key projects and stakeholders driving new business opportunities.

Support the Head of Strategy and partner with the VP of Business Operations to advance deals by preparing proposals contract templates and other materials while facilitating legal and commercial aspects to ensure alignment with company objectives.
Act as the primary point of contact for prospects and clients throughout the deal cycle ensuring consistent and professional communication.
Coordinate and schedule calls meetings and follow-ups to maintain deal momentum.
Track and document meeting notes action items and updates ensuring all stakeholders are aligned.
Serve as a business overlay to vertical leads and customer success facilitating renewal and upsell strategies by aligning customer needs with business objectives and maximizing value.
Work closely with internal teams to ensure seamless handoffs and ongoing communication with clients.
Build and nurture key customer relationships focusing on driving long-term value and satisfaction.
Clearly articulate and develop value propositions for projects in the pipeline to drive and qualify leads effectively.
Represent the company at key Web3 Fintech Blockchain and DeFi events to network with potential partners and customers.
Identify and pursue strategic opportunities by engaging with industry leaders and influencers.
benefits: Competitive PTO (21 days) + sick days (7) + 8 observed US-company holidays.
100% employer-paid health benefit options (Medical dental & vision insurance) for you and your dependents.
FSA or HSA (pending on selected health insurance).
Corporate wellness programs with OneMedical Teladoc Talkspace EAP.
Career growth opportunities at a rapidly expanding global technology company in an emerging field with personalized professional development.

organization.summary: Our platform transforms on-chain risk management, security, and incentive strategies. We automate real-time protocol parameter recommendations through advanced Risk Oracles, sophisticated data analytics, modeling, and simulations.
organization.description: At Chaos Labs, we're reimagining the future of DeFi with automated, on-chain economic security systems. Our mission is simple: optimize risk management and capital efficiency for DeFi protocols while safeguarding user funds.
organization.name: Chaos Labs
